def calculate_remainder(a, b):
    a = abs(a)
    b = abs(b)
    if a == 0 and b == 0:
        return 'Error: Zero is not allowed as an input'
    greater = max(a, b)
    smaller = min(a, b)
    remainder = greater % smaller
    return remainder
